AddEntriesToAcl.title: AddEntriesToAcl
AddEntriesToAcl.summary: Adds IP entries to an access control list (ACL).

AddServersToServerGroup.title: AddServersToServerGroup
AddServersToServerGroup.summary: Adds backend servers to a server group.

ApplyHealthCheckTemplateToServerGroup.title: ApplyHealthCheckTemplateToServerGroup
ApplyHealthCheckTemplateToServerGroup.summary: Applies a health check template to a server group.

AssociateAclsWithListener.title: AssociateAclsWithListener
AssociateAclsWithListener.summary: Associates access control lists (ACLs) with a listener.

AssociateAdditionalCertificatesWithListe.title: AssociateAdditionalCertificatesWithListener
AssociateAdditionalCertificatesWithListe.summary: Associates additional certificates with a listener.

AttachCommonBandwidthPackageToLoadBalanc.title: AttachCommonBandwidthPackageToLoadBalancer
AttachCommonBandwidthPackageToLoadBalanc.summary: Associates an EIP bandwidth plan with an Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance.

CancelShiftLoadBalancerZones.title: CancelShiftLoadBalancerZones
CancelShiftLoadBalancerZones.summary: Adds the elastic IP address (EIP) and virtual IP address (VIP) of a zone to a DNS record.

CreateAcl.title: CreateAcl
CreateAcl.summary: Creates an access control list (ACL) in a region.

CreateHealthCheckTemplate.title: CreateHealthCheckTemplate
CreateHealthCheckTemplate.summary: Creates a health check template in a region.

CreateListener.title: CreateListener
CreateListener.summary: Creates an HTTP, HTTPS, or QUIC listener in a region.

CreateLoadBalancer.title: CreateLoadBalancer
CreateLoadBalancer.summary: Creates an Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance in a region.

CreateRule.title: CreateRule
CreateRule.summary: Creates a forwarding rule for a listener.

CreateRules.title: CreateRules
CreateRules.summary: Creates one or more forwarding rules at a time.

CreateSecurityPolicy.title: CreateSecurityPolicy
CreateSecurityPolicy.summary: Creates a custom security policy in a region.

CreateServerGroup.title: CreateServerGroup
CreateServerGroup.summary: Creates a server group in a region.

DeleteLoadBalancer.title: DeleteLoadBalancer
DeleteLoadBalancer.summary: Deletes an Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance.

DeleteRules.title: DeleteRules
DeleteRules.summary: Deletes one or more forwarding rules from a listener at a time.

DetachCommonBandwidthPackageFromLoadBala.title: DetachCommonBandwidthPackageFromLoadBalancer
DetachCommonBandwidthPackageFromLoadBala.summary: Disassociates an elastic IP address (EIP) bandwidth plan from an Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance.

DisableDeletionProtection.title: DisableDeletionProtection
DisableDeletionProtection.summary: Disables deletion protection for an Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance.

DisableLoadBalancerAccessLog.title: DisableLoadBalancerAccessLog
DisableLoadBalancerAccessLog.summary: Disables the access log feature for a Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance.

DisableLoadBalancerIpv6Internet.title: DisableLoadBalancerIpv6Internet
DisableLoadBalancerIpv6Internet.summary: Changes the type of the IPv6 address that is used by a dual-stack Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance from public to private.

DissociateAclsFromListener.title: DissociateAclsFromListener
DissociateAclsFromListener.summary: Disassociates access control lists (ACLs) from a listener.

DissociateAdditionalCertificatesFromList.title: DissociateAdditionalCertificatesFromListener
DissociateAdditionalCertificatesFromList.summary: Disassociates additional certificates from a listener.

EnableDeletionProtection.title: EnableDeletionProtection
EnableDeletionProtection.summary: Enables deletion protection for a resource.

EnableLoadBalancerAccessLog.title: EnableLoadBalancerAccessLog
EnableLoadBalancerAccessLog.summary: Enables the access log feature for an Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance.

EnableLoadBalancerIpv6Internet.title: EnableLoadBalancerIpv6Internet
EnableLoadBalancerIpv6Internet.summary: Changes the type of the IPv6 address that is used by a dual-stack Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance from private to public.

GetHealthCheckTemplateAttribute.title: GetHealthCheckTemplateAttribute
GetHealthCheckTemplateAttribute.summary: Queries the details about a health check template.

GetListenerAttribute.title: GetListenerAttribute
GetListenerAttribute.summary: Queries the details about a listener.

GetListenerHealthStatus.title: GetListenerHealthStatus
GetListenerHealthStatus.summary: Queries the health check status of a listener and its forwarding rules.

GetLoadBalancerAttribute.title: GetLoadBalancerAttribute
GetLoadBalancerAttribute.summary: Queries the details of an Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance.

ListAclEntries.title: ListAclEntries
ListAclEntries.summary: Queries the entries of an access control list (ACL).

ListAclRelations.title: ListAclRelations
ListAclRelations.summary: Queries the listeners that are associated with access control lists (ACLs).

ListAcls.title: ListAcls
ListAcls.summary: Queries the access control lists (ACLs) in a region.

ListAsynJobs.title: ListAsynJobs
ListAsynJobs.summary: Queries asynchronous tasks in a region.

ListHealthCheckTemplates.title: ListHealthCheckTemplates
ListHealthCheckTemplates.summary: Queries health check templates in a region.

ListListenerCertificates.title: ListListenerCertificates
ListListenerCertificates.summary: Queries the certificates that are associated with a listener, including additional certificates and the default certificate.

ListListeners.title: ListListeners
ListListeners.summary: Queries the listeners in a region.

ListLoadBalancers.title: ListLoadBalancers
ListLoadBalancers.summary: Queries Application Load Balancer (ALB) instances in a region based on filter conditions.

ListRules.title: ListRules
ListRules.summary: Queries the forwarding rules in a region.

ListSecurityPolicies.title: ListSecurityPolicies
ListSecurityPolicies.summary: Queries custom security policies in a region.

ListSecurityPolicyRelations.title: ListSecurityPolicyRelations
ListSecurityPolicyRelations.summary: Queries the listeners that are associated with security policies.

ListServerGroupServers.title: ListServerGroupServers
ListServerGroupServers.summary: Queries servers in a server group.

ListServerGroups.title: ListServerGroups
ListServerGroups.summary: Queries server groups in a region.

ListSystemSecurityPolicies.title: ListSystemSecurityPolicies
ListSystemSecurityPolicies.summary: Queries system security policies in a region.

MoveResourceGroup.title: MoveResourceGroup
MoveResourceGroup.summary: Moves a resource to another resource group.

RemoveEntriesFromAcl.title: RemoveEntriesFromAcl
RemoveEntriesFromAcl.summary: Removes entries from an access control list (ACL).

RemoveServersFromServerGroup.title: RemoveServersFromServerGroup
RemoveServersFromServerGroup.summary: Removes backend servers from a server group.

ReplaceServersInServerGroup.title: ReplaceServersInServerGroup
ReplaceServersInServerGroup.summary: Replaces backend servers in a server group.

StartShiftLoadBalancerZones.title: StartShiftLoadBalancerZones
StartShiftLoadBalancerZones.summary: Removes an elastic IP address (EIP) or a virtual IP address (VIP) of a zone from a DNS record.

UpdateAclAttribute.title: UpdateAclAttribute
UpdateAclAttribute.summary: Updates the attributes of an access control list (ACL), such as the name.

UpdateHealthCheckTemplateAttribute.title: UpdateHealthCheckTemplateAttribute
UpdateHealthCheckTemplateAttribute.summary: Modifies the attributes, such as the name and protocol, of a health check template.

UpdateListenerAttribute.title: UpdateListenerAttribute
UpdateListenerAttribute.summary: Updates the attributes of a listener, such as the name and the default action.

UpdateListenerLogConfig.title: UpdateListenerLogConfig
UpdateListenerLogConfig.summary: Updates the log configuration of a listener, such as the access log configuration.

UpdateLoadBalancerAddressTypeConfig.title: UpdateLoadBalancerAddressTypeConfig
UpdateLoadBalancerAddressTypeConfig.summary: Modifies the network type of an Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance.

UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute.title: UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute
UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute.summary: Modifies the attributes of an Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance, such as the name and the configuration read-only mode.

UpdateLoadBalancerEdition.title: UpdateLoadBalancerEdition
UpdateLoadBalancerEdition.summary: Changes the edition of an Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance.

UpdateLoadBalancerZones.title: UpdateLoadBalancerZones
UpdateLoadBalancerZones.summary: Modifies the zones of an Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance.

UpdateRuleAttribute.title: UpdateRuleAttribute
UpdateRuleAttribute.summary: Updates a forwarding rule, such as the match condition, action, and name.

UpdateRulesAttribute.title: UpdateRulesAttribute
UpdateRulesAttribute.summary: Modifies the attributes of forwarding rules.

UpdateSecurityPolicyAttribute.title: UpdateSecurityPolicyAttribute
UpdateSecurityPolicyAttribute.summary: Updates the attributes of a security policy, such as the TLS protocol version and the supported cipher suites.

UpdateServerGroupAttribute.title: UpdateServerGroupAttribute
UpdateServerGroupAttribute.summary: Modifies the configurations of a server group, such as health checks, session persistence, server group names, routing algorithms, and protocols.

UpdateServerGroupServersAttribute.title: UpdateServerGroupServersAttribute
UpdateServerGroupServersAttribute.summary: Modifies the configurations, such as the backend server weight and description, of a server group.
